page.title: 09Services in Emborough
page.content: Although in Somerset county this area comes uder the postal district of bath. It is served by Mendip District council being represented under the East Shepton ward which is part of the Wells consititency. The member of parliament for this area is at the present time Mr D Heathcoat-Amory, Conservative. Emborough itself has no parish council but a parish meeting is held once a year. Electricity is provided by South Western Electricity Board, water by Wessex Water Authority and Bristol Waterworks. There is no main drainage in the area. Although a new gas pipeline has just traversed the area there is no gas available.
